name: Blade of Reclamation
description:
Blade of Reclamation

The kingdom’s castle’s still-smoking foundation lies just over the horizon behind the sole survivor, a princess. Facing back at her is a wall of forest that stretches to the heavens and casts shadows of what lies within. Trek and Fight your way through overwhelming odds in this dark fantasy game. Try to piece together how everything went so wrong so fast by connecting village refugees. Will you reclaim your birthright or fall with the rest of the world?
